snippet: The sun rises in Port St. Lucie this time of year well before 7 in the morning, but by that time many Mets players and coaches are already at work.
abstract: Many New York Mets players and coaches arrive before daybreak to begin their spring training workouts.
lead_paragraph: The sun rises in Port St. Lucie this time of year well before 7 in the morning, but by that time many Mets players and coaches are already at work.

headline.seo: For Mets’ Early Risers, Bacon, Eggs and a Workout
headline.main: For Mets’ Early Risers, Bacon, Eggs and a Workout
